solution_line_template: Dan spent an hour doing {first_work_tasks} tasks * ${first_work_rate} = ${first_work_earnings}.
Dan spent an hour doing {second_work_tasks} tasks * ${second_work_rate} each = $<<{second_work_tasks}*{second_work_rate}={second_work_earnings}>>{second_work_earnings}.
Dan made ${first_work_earnings} - ${second_work_earnings} = $<<{first_work_earnings}-{second_work_earnings}={earnings_difference}>>{earnings_difference} per hour more doing the higher paid work.
